mapper.sql: PID, PRODUCT_NAME, DESIGNATION, STANDARD, CATEGORY_ID, USED, THUMBNAIL, PRODUCT_DESC, PRODUCT_MANUAL, SORT_NUMBER, PRODUCT_AREA, STATUS, CREATE_BYID, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DT, UPDATE_BYID, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DT, FACTORY
mapper.select: SELECT A.PID, A.PRODUCT_NAME, A.DESIGNATION, A.STANDARD, A.CATEGORY_ID, A.USED, A.THUMBNAIL, A.PRODUCT_DESC, A.PRODUCT_MANUAL, A.SORT_NUMBER, A.PRODUCT_AREA, A.STATUS, A.CREATE_BYID, A.CREATE_BY, A.CREATE_DT, A.UPDATE_BYID, A.UPDATE_BY, A.UPDATE_DT, A.FACTORY, B.CATEGORY_NAME FROM CRM_PRODUCT_INFO A LEFT JOIN CRM_PRODUCT_CATEGORY b ON A .CATEGORY_ID = b.cid where PID = #{pid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_CRM_PRODUCT_INFO.nextval FROM dual
insert into CRM_PRODUCT_INFO (PID, PRODUCT_NAME, DESIGNATION, STANDARD, CATEGORY_ID, USED, THUMBNAIL, PRODUCT_DESC, PRODUCT_MANUAL, SORT_NUMBER, PRODUCT_AREA, STATUS, CREATE_BYID, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DT, UPDATE_BYID, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DT, FACTORY ) values (#{pid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{designation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{standard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{used,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thumbnail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productManual,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortNumber,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{productArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} #{createByid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateByid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{factory} )

update CRM_PRODUCT_INFO
PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESIGNATION = #{designation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STANDARD = #{standard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
USED = #{used,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

PRODUCT_DESC = #{productDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where PID = #{pid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
